question: Does nintedanib improve response rate in patients with bladder cancer?
ideal_answer: No. The addition of nintedanib to chemotherapy was safe but did not improve the rate of pathological complete response in muscle-invasive bladder cancer.

snippets.text: INTERPRETATION: The addition of nintedanib to chemotherapy was safe but did not improve the rate of pathological complete response in muscle-invasive bladder cancer.FUNDING: Boehringer Ingelheim.
